oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of Union veteran John Frazier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sgt. Frazier served from Carter County in Co. B, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA and was injured in the left eye by the accidental discharge of his gun at Camp Nelson, Ky. on January 1, 1864, which he discusses in a letter to his brother in cart037.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Frazier, John
